articles.title: Here’s how the Spanish Flu is similar and different from the coronavirus - Global News
articles.description: The Spanish Flu of 1918 is seen as a benchmark in how the world sees, responds to and quantifies pandemics. But how does it compare to today?
articles.content:
Just over 100 years ago, the world was in the midst of a pandemic, just like it is now.
